00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # pygame + PyOpenGL version of Nehe's OpenGL lesson04
00003 # Paul Furber 2001 - m@verick.co.za
00004 
00005 from OpenGL.GL import *
00006 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00007 import pygame
00008 from pygame.locals import *
00009 
00010 rtri = rquad = 0.0
00011 
00012 def resize((width, height)):
00013     if height==0:
00014         height=1
00015     glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00016     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00017     glLoadIdentity()
00018     gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00019     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00020     glLoadIdentity()
00021 
00022 def init():
00023     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00024     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00025     glClearDepth(1.0)
00026     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00027     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00028     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00029     rtri = 0.0
00030     rquad = 0.0
00031 
00032 def draw():
00033     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT|GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT)
00034     glLoadIdentity()
00035 
00036     glTranslatef(-1.5, 0.0, -6.0)
00037 
00038     global rtri
00039     glRotatef(rtri, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00040 
00041     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES)
00042     glColor3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00043     glVertex3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00044     glColor3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00045     glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, 0)
00046     glColor3f(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00047     glVertex3f(1.0, -1.0, 0)
00048     glEnd()
00049 
00050     glLoadIdentity()
00051     glTranslatef(1.5, 0.0, -6.0)
00052     global rquad
00053     glRotatef(rquad, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00054 
00055     glColor3f(0.5, 0.5, 1.0)
00056     glBegin(GL_QUADS)
00057     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0, 0)
00058     glVertex3f(1.0, 1.0, 0)
00059     glVertex3f(1.0, -1.0, 0)
00060     glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, 0)
00061     glEnd()
00062 
00063     rtri += 0.2
00064     rquad+= 0.2
00065 
00066 def main():
00067 
00068     video_flags = OPENGL|DOUBLEBUF
00069     
00070     pygame.init()
00071     pygame.display.set_mode((640,480), video_flags)
00072 
00073     resize((640,480))
00074     init()
00075 
00076     frames = 0
00077     ticks = pygame.time.get_ticks()
00078     while 1:
00079         event = pygame.event.poll()
00080         if event.type == QUIT or (event.type == KEYDOWN and event.key == K_ESCAPE):
00081             break
00082         
00083         draw()
00084         pygame.display.flip()
00085         frames = frames+1
00086 
00087     print "fps:  %d" % ((frames*1000)/(pygame.time.get_ticks()-ticks))
00088 
00089 
00090 if __name__ == '__main__': main()
00091
